text: wed allah almuminin walmuminat biallah warasulih janaat tajri min tahtiha al'anhar maakithin fiha abdana, la yzwl eanhum neymha, wamasakin hasanatan albina' tayibatan alqarar fi janaat 'iqamt, waridwan min allah 'akbar wa'aezam mimma hum fih min alneym. dhlk alwaed bthwab alakhirat hu alfalah alezym
